sourcesContent:
export const fakeListings = [{
    id:'123',
    Date:'07/01/2021',
    KITREF_NO:'KITLEN012101TTS',
    Month:'JAN',
    LENOVO_CLAIM:'40CTYFT',
    Customer:'LULU Hypermarket',
    Machine_Type:'20KN0000AD',
    Serial_NO:'PF0ZZ0Y8',
    Warranty_Expiry:'14/04/2021',
    Warranty_Type:'NULL',
    DEF_FRU:'00PA934',
    DEF_SERIAL_NO:'8SSH20E38314S2CW7CD2316',
    REP_FRU:'00PA937',
    REP_SNO:'8SSH20E38322W5TB99E0073',
    Problem_Reported:'HDD',
    Action_Taken:'NULL',
    Recieved_Date:'13/01/2021',
    Remarks:'NULL'

},{
    id:'134',
    Date:'11/01/2021',
    KITREF_NO:'KITLEN012101TTS',
    Month:'JAN',
    LENOVO_CLAIM:'40CTZ8V',
    Customer:'Salih mohamed',
    Machine_Type:'20KJ0017US',
    Serial_NO:'PF179K6S',
    Warranty_Expiry:'30/07/2021',
    Warranty_Type:'ONSITE',
    DEF_FRU:'01AW830',
    DEF_SERIAL_NO:'NULL',
    REP_FRU:'02HL150',
    REP_SNO:'NULL',
    Problem_Reported:'KEYBOARD (DOCK)',
    Action_Taken:'NULL',
    Recieved_Date:'13/01/2021',
    Remarks:'NULL'

}];

import { db } from '../database';

export const updateListingRoute = {
    method: 'POST',
    path: '/api/listings/{id}',
    handler: async (req, h) => {
        const { id } = req.params;
        const {
            ListingDate,
            KITREF_NO,
            Month,
            LENOVO_CLAIM,
            Customer,
            Machine_Type,
            Serial_NO,
            Warranty_Expiry,
            Warranty_Type,
            DEF_FRU,
            DEF_SERIAL_NO,
            REP_FRU,
            REP_SNO,
            Problem_Reported,
            Action_Taken,
            Recieved_Date,
            Remarks
        } = req.payload;
        const user_id = '12345';

        // Set default values
        const ModifyUserId = '12345'; // Replace with dynamic user ID if applicable
        const ModifyDate = new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 19).replace('T', ' '); // Current date and time in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'

        try {
            console.log('Data being updated:', {
                ListingDate,
                KITREF_NO,
                Month,
                LENOVO_CLAIM,
                Customer,
                Machine_Type,
                Serial_NO,
                Warranty_Expiry,
                Warranty_Type,
                DEF_FRU,
                DEF_SERIAL_NO,
                REP_FRU,
                REP_SNO,
                Problem_Reported,
                Action_Taken,
                Recieved_Date,
                Remarks,
                ModifyUserId,
                ModifyDate,
                id,
                user_id
            });

            await db.query(`
                UPDATE listings
                SET Date=?, KITREF_NO=?, Month=?, LENOVO_CLAIM=?, Customer=?, Machine_Type=?, Serial_NO=?, 
                    Warranty_Expiry=?, Warranty_Type=?, DEF_FRU=?, DEF_SERIAL_NO=?, REP_FRU=?, REP_SNO=?, 
                    Problem_Reported=?, Action_Taken=?, Recieved_Date=?, Remarks=?, ModifyUserId=?, ModifyDate=?
                WHERE id=? AND user_id=?
            `, [
                ListingDate,
                KITREF_NO,
                Month,
                LENOVO_CLAIM,
                Customer,
                Machine_Type,
                Serial_NO,
                Warranty_Expiry,
                Warranty_Type,
                DEF_FRU,
                DEF_SERIAL_NO,
                REP_FRU,
                REP_SNO,
                Problem_Reported,
                Action_Taken,
                Recieved_Date,
                Remarks,
                ModifyUserId,
                ModifyDate,
                id,
                user_id
            ]);

            const { results } = await db.query(
                'SELECT * FROM listings WHERE id=? AND user_id=?',
                [id, user_id]
            );

            return results[0];
        } catch (err) {
            console.error('Error updating data:', err);  // Print full error object
            return h.response({ error: 'Failed to update listing' }).code(500);
        }
    }
};
